acceptanceCriteria: Each generated PNG visually shows a crisp, centered pink heart on a solid white circular background (no transparent background).

requirements.text: Update `frontend/index.html` favicon `<link>` tags to fully match the regenerated favicon set (paths, filenames, and sizes), replacing any existing favicon link tags so browsers load the new assets correctly.

quotes: fix the missing favicon assets and update the HTML so the favicon displays correctly.

requirements.text: Update the favicon generation utility (`frontend/src/lib/generate-favicons.ts`) so that its output matches the selected style (pink heart on a white circular background) and remains aligned with the favicon sizes/filenames used by `frontend/index.html`.
